config.ichunutil.cat.general.name: General Options
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.name: Gameplay
config.ichunutil.cat.global.name: Global Options
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.name: Server Options
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.name: Client Only
config.ichunutil.cat.block.name: Block
config.ichunutil.cat.bns.name: Boxes & Stuff
config.ichunutil.cat.general.desc: These options are general options that don't fit any other category.
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.desc: These options affect the gameplay while using the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.global.desc: These options affect both servers and clients that load the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.desc: These options affect only the server that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.desc: These options affect only the client that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.block.desc: These options affect the blocks in the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.bns.desc: These options affect Boxes & Stuff GUIs.
config.ichunutil.prop.easterEgg.name: Client Easter Eggs
config.ichunutil.prop.easterEgg.desc: Enables (most) Client-Side Easter Eggs for iChun's Mods
Renders iChunUtil's GUIs (Boxes & Stuff) in a Minecraft Style instead
config.ichunutil.prop.guiDockPadding.des: How much padding to add to the docked windows
config.ichunutil.prop.guiTooltipCooldown: Number of ticks before showing a tooltip
config.ichunutil.prop.guiDockBorder.name: Dock Border Size
config.ichunutil.prop.guiDockBorder.desc: Number of pixels before iChunUtil thinks you're trying to dock a window
config.ichunutil.prop.guiDoubleClickSpee: Speed, in ticks, to register a double click
config.ichunutil.prop.buttonOptionsShift: Override the Options button so pressing Shift when clicking it shows the Mods list.
config.ichunutil.cat.headTracking.name: Head Model Tracking
config.ichunutil.cat.headTracking.desc:
Head Model Tracking related configs.
Used by Googly Eyes and Hats.
config.ichunutil.prop.aggressiveHeadTrac:
Track the head model aggressively to try and fix improper head tracking that may be caused by mod conflicts?
1 = All Entities
2 = Players Only
config.ichunutil.prop.horseEasterEgg.des: Enable the easter egg where the horse/llama's "head" is its behind. This is an easter egg on how Hats used to put hats on Horses.
gui.ichunutil.configs.title: Config Editor
gui.ichunutil.configs.noEditingServerCon: You can't edit a Server config whilst on a Dedicated Server!
window.popup.title: Alert!
window.saveAs.title: Save As
